xfy.fakeview.library.layermerge

类 LayersMergeEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • xfy.fakeview.library.layermerge.LayersMergeEngine
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    OnExtractViewGroupListener

    public class LayersMergeEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnExtractViewGroupListener
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/10. An Engine for merging layers, which can be paused. Usually this is used in a list view(ListView or RecyclerView), pause mergine when list view is scrolling.
    另请参阅:
    pause(), resume(), addMergeAction(Object, FrameLayout), addMergeAction(Object, FrameLayout, int), removeMergeActionByTag(Object), removeAllAction()

      • getEngine

        public static LayersMergeEngine getEngine()

        public void pause()

        public void resume()

      • release

        public static void release()

      • addMergeAction

        public boolean addMergeAction(java.lang.Object tag,
                              android.widget.FrameLayout layout)
        Add a merge action with none extracing info.
        参数:
        tag - for searching this action
        layout - needed to merging
        返回:
        true: add to scheduler, false otherwise
        另请参阅:
        LayersMergeManager.extractFlag, removeMergeActionByTag(Object)

      • addMergeAction

        public boolean addMergeAction(java.lang.Object tag,
                              android.widget.FrameLayout layout,
                              int extractInfo)
        Add a merge action with custom extracting info.
        参数:
        tag - for searching this action
        layout - needed to merging
        extractInfo - custom extracing info
        返回:
        true: add to scheduler, false otherwise
        另请参阅:
        LayersMergeManager.extractFlag, removeMergeActionByTag(Object)

      • addMergeAction

        public boolean addMergeAction(LayersMergeEngine.LayoutData layoutData)
        Add a merge action
        参数:
        layoutData - contain layout, tag, extract info etc..
        返回:
        true: add to scheduler, false otherwise
        另请参阅:
        LayersMergeEngine.LayoutData

      • removeMergeActionByTag

        public void removeMergeActionByTag(java.lang.Object tag)
        Remove merge action by tag. If action is processing, it cannot be removed.
        参数:
        tag - for searching this action

      • removeAllAction

        public void removeAllAction()
        Remove all unprocessing merge actions.

      • onExtract

        public OnExtractViewGroupListener.Result onExtract(android.view.ViewGroup src)
        从接口复制的说明: OnExtractViewGroupListener
        Called when extracting viewgroup
        指定者:
        onExtract 在接口中 OnExtractViewGroupListener
        参数:
        src - target ViewGroup
        返回:
        result for extracting info, or null.
        另请参阅:
        OnExtractViewGroupListener.Result
